EmailTemplate.name: Send to Invite to Interview 2 China
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps: Advancement to Interview 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Fellow_Application__c.Applicant_First_Name__c},
Thank you for meeting with our interviewer to discuss your interests and qualifications for the Climate Corps China program. We are pleased to inform you that you are among a group of highly qualified applicants chosen to advance to the next stage of the fellow selection process. Congratulations!
Next Steps
A Climate Corps China fellow-matching team member will contact you after the Chinese New Year holiday week to schedule your final interview. If you have competing job offer deadlines, impending travel plans that will limit your communication, or any other urgent notifications, please notify us by contacting climatecorps@cet.net.cn.
We look forward to discussing your application in your next interview!
Best regards,
The Climate Corps Team
*Please do not reply to this email. We will not respond to any inquiries sent to this address. Please follow the instructions above to contact us.
